src_original: tu 'od ma dkar ser de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dzin pa'o/_/lho phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis ni/_phyag gnyis kyi g.yas pa rin po che 'dzin pa la/
g.yon pa ram gyi phyag mtshhan 'dzin pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo
spo ti 'dzin pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dkar dmar 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin

pa/_tshhul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_mya ngan med pa'i yal ga me tog dang bcas pa 'dzin pa/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ser mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa/_brtshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmar po ud pa la 'dzin pa/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon mo pad+ma 'dzin pa/_thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ljang khu rdo rje 'dzin pa/_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon mo ral gri
'dzin pa/_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmar mo chos gos 'dzin pa/_ye shes
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkar mo byang chub kyi shing 'dzin pa/_rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthing kha rdo rje thogs pa/_pad+ma las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmar mo zla
ba 'dzin pa'o/_/nub tu dbang bcu'i lha mo ni/_phyag gnyis kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma 'dzin pa/_g.yon pa rnams kyis rang rang gi phyag mtshhan 'dzin
mngon par rtogs pa mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ pa ni tshhe la dbang ba ma ni dkar dmar gyi mdog can sangs rgyas tshhe dpag med

kyi steng du gzhal yas khang /_de'i dbus su seng ge'i steng du sna tshhogs pad+ma'i steng du/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje'i skyil krungs kyis gnas pa dkar po nyi ma'i rgyab yol can/_zhal bzhi pa/_dkar po dang /_ser po

dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang khu'i zhal la sangs rgyas lnga dang /_rin po che'i brgyan sna tshhogs kyis brgyan pa la/_a b+h+ya'i bzhed kyis/_phyag brgyad pa la/_'dir ni phyag gnyis pa chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya can 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/_/
thogs pa'o/_/shar du glang po che'i steng du mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje rtshe lnga pa sa gnon gyi tshhul du 'dzin pa/_'khor rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa/
lho phyogs su rta'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rdo rje skyil krungs rin po che
rdo rje rgyal po ser po lcags kyu thogs pa/_rdo rje chags pa dmar po mda' thogs
rdo rje rgyal po ser po lcags kyu thogs pa/_rdo rje chags pa dmar po mda' thogs
pa/_legs pa ljang khu rdo rje dang bcas pas thugs khar legs so sbyin pa'o/_/
lho phyogs su rta'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rdo rje skyil krungs rin po che
ser po gung mos bzung ste mchod sbyin gyi tshhul du byed pa'o/_/'khor lhor rdo rje
rin po che ser po rin po che thogs pa/_gzi brjid dmar ser nyi ma bsnams pa/ dpal 'bar sngon po rgyal mtshhan bsnams pa/_bzhad pa dkar po phreng ba
bsnams pa'o/_/nub du rma bya'i steng du snang ba mtha' yas dmar po mnyam bzhag gi 'thil na/_pad+ma bsnams pa la/_'khor rdo rje chos rab dkar
dmar nyi ma bsnams pa/_rnon po mdog sngo ba la ral gri 'dzin pa/_rdo rje rgyu
mdog ser po 'khor lo bsnams pa/_smu ba dmar po rdo rje'i lce bsnams pa'o/_/
byang du shang shang gi steng du don yod grub pa ljang khu skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya'i
mthil na sna tshhogs rdo rje 'dzin pa la/_'khor rdo rje las rab 'ja'i mdog ltar bkra ba la sna tshhogs rdo rje thogs pa/_bsrung ba ser po go khrab thogs pa/
gnod sbyin mthing nag rdo rje mche ba thogs pa/_khu tshhur ser po rdo rje'i khu tshhur
bcangs pa'o/_/lhor bsgyeg mo dkar mo rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa/_lho nub
tu phreng ba ma ser mo me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa/_nub byang du glu mkhan ma

dmar mo pi wam thogs pa/_byang shar du gar ma ljang khu/_rdo rje dang dril bus gar bsgyur ba/_khyams kyi shar lhor bdug spos ma dkar mo bdug spos thogs pa/ lho nub tu me tog ma ser mo me tog thogs pa/_nub byang du mar me ma dmar mo mar me thogs pa/_byang shar du dri chab ma ljang khu dri'i dung chos thogs pa'o/_/
'khyams la shar du/_byams pa/_mthong ba don yod/_ngan song kun 'dren mya ngan mun 'joms rnams mi bskyod pa lta bu'o/_/lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po/
dkar g.yon dmar/_phyag dang po gnyis ro mchog gi snod la/_phyag lhag ma
gsum la lha rnam la byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bsam pa ni shar du byams pa
dang sa'i snying po/_lhor phyag rdor dang nam mkha'i snying po/_nub tu spyan ras
gzigs dang 'jam dpal/_byang du sgrib sel dang kun bzang /_brgyad po sku mdog phyag mtshhan rigs bzhi dang 'thun pa'o/_/khyams kyi sgo bzhi dang zur
bzhi ste/_steng 'og shar nub tu/_khro bo bcu bsgom pa ni/_shar sgor gshin

rje gshed sku mdog nag po/_g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba phyag drug gi dang po na tho ba dang sdigs mdzub bar ma na 'khor lo dang dril bu/_tha ma rdo rje dang ral gri/_lhor gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar po/_g.yas nag g.yon dmar po/
mgrin mdog dmar po g.yas nag g.yon dkar po/_phyag drug gi dang po gnyis
pad+ma dang dril bu/_bar ma gnyis ral gri dang dgra sta/_tha ma gnyis na gtun
dmar g.yon dkar po/_phyag drug gi dang po gnyis sna tshhogs rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub/_gnyis pa na 'khor lo dang zhags pa/_tha ma gnyis na gtun shing
dang dgra sta/_shar lho mtshhams kyi mi g.yo ba sngo nag g.yas dmar g.yon dkar/
phyag drug gi dang po gnyis ral gri dang sdigs mdzub/_gnyis pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/_gsum pa na 'khor lo dang zhags pa'o/_/lho nub mtshhams su 'dod
pa'i rgyal po nag po g.yas dmar g.yon dkar po'o/_/phyag drug gi dang po
gnyis ni the'u chung bsgreng zhing mdzub mo bsgreng ba'o/_/bar ma gnyis rdo rje dang zhags pa/_'og ma na ral gri dang lcags kyu/_nub byang gi dbyug sngon can
sngon po g.yas dmar g.yon dkar po/_phyag drug gi dang po gnyis na dbyug pa dang sdigs mdzub bar ma gnyis na ral gri dang dril bu 'og ma gnyis na 'khor lo
nyon mongs pa'i bdud khyab 'jug nag po/_'chi bdag gi bdud dbang phyug
chen po dkar po/_lha'i bu'i bdud ma ha de ba ser po/_de'i steng du hum las
bzhi pa sku mdog 'thing nag_/zhal brgyad pa rtsha zhal 'thing kha g.yas dkar ba/
g.yon dmar ba/_lhag ma bzhi nag po'i steng zhal dud kha/_mche ba gtshigs
pa/_g.yas kyi phyag brgyad na rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang /_'khor lo dang /_ka pa la dang /_dbyug pa dang /_rtshe gsum pa dang /_lcags kyu
bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon gyi brgyad na dril bu dang /_pad+ma dang /_gzhu dang / kha tam kha dang /_thod pa dang /_rin po che dang /_sdigs mdzub dang zhags

pa'o/_/zhabs bzhi brkyang skum bdud bzhi brdzis pa'o/_/yum bdag med ma rdo rje dang dril bu bzung bas sku la 'khril ba'o/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la shar du sgo ri dkar mo phyag bzhi gri gug dang nya dang mda' gzhu 'dzin pa'o/_/
lhor tsho ri ma dmar mo phyag bzhi yis rdo rje da ma ru dang lcags kyu phag 'dzin pa'o//

nub tu ro langs ma sku mdog dkar ser ral gri dang rus sbal dang khrag dang / chang gis bskang ba'i thod pa gnyis 'dzin pa'o/_/byang du g+has ma ri ljang ser zhun gyis bskang ba'i thod pa dang sbrul dang /_me thab dang /_dgra sta 'dzin
pa'o/_/dbang ldan du pu ka si ser mo thod pa dang seng ge dang /_shing dang / rin po che 'dzin pa'o/_/me'i mtshhams su sha ba ri dkar mo/_byang chub kyi
